data.comment: The match has started.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Fulham at Molineux Stadium.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Wolverhampton's Daniel Podence gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
In the minute 5, Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Antonee Robinson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 8, Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 15, Free kick Fulham.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in Wolverhampton.
Darren England signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to Wolverhampton's area.
In the minute 22, Darren England signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
In the minute 26, Darren England signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Wolverhampton Wolverhampton drive forward through Pedro Neto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 27, Wolverhampton pushes forward through Nelson Semedo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
Darren England signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Fulham's area.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Raul Jimenez's header is off-target for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Darren England signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Darren England signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
The first-half is over.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Darren England awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Fulham are pushing forward but Aleksandar Mitrovic's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 48, Darren England awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fulham's half?
Ruben Neves of Wolverhampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Darren England signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 52, Free kick Wolverhampton.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Wolverhampton to check on Leander Dendoncker, who is grimacing with pain.
Wolverhamptonâ€™s Leander Dendoncker is on his feet again at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 55, Fulham to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Raul Jimenez gets in a shot on goal at Molineux Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Leander Dendoncker for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Molineux Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Pedro Neto.
In the minute 57, Darren England signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Molineux Stadium.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
In the minute 60, Fulham needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Fulham push forward at Molineux Stadium and Aleksandar Mitrovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 65, Wolverhampton's Nelson Semedo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolverhampton.
In Wolverhampton a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 67, Fulham make their first substitution with Ademola Lookman replacing Ivan Cavaleiro.
Aboubakar Kamara is replacing Joe Bryan for Fulham at Molineux Stadium.
Goal kick for Fulham at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 69, In Wolverhampton, Raul Jimenez of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Joao Moutinho is replacing Daniel Podence for the home team.
Free kick in a good position for Wolverhampton!
In the minute 73, Aboubakar Kamara gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in Wolverhampton.
The match at Molineux Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nelson Semedo, who is down injured.
In the minute 77, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Antonee Robinson (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Wolverhampton defence as Aboubakar Kamara fires in a strike for Fulham.
In the minute 78, Nelson Semedo is back on his feet again.
Wolverhampton drive upfield and Pedro Neto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Ki-Jana Hoever (Wolverhampton) has replaced the possibly injured Nelson Semedo at Molineux Stadium.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Darren England signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Maxime Le Marchand (Fulham) has received a yellow card from Darren England.
In the minute 80, Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Darren England signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Fulham's half.
The away team replace Bobby Reid with Neeskens Kebano.
In the minute 82, Darren England awards Fulham a goal kick.
Adama Traore is on a sub for Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ruben Neves is booked for the home team.
